lead_paragraph: No. 7 Sub's new location, opening next Wednesday in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, is larger and more elaborate than the original No. 7 in Fort Greene, but will have an inventive sandwich menu that's similar to the one at the sub shop that the owners, including the chef, Tyler Kord, have in the Ace Hotel in Manhattan.

headline.main: No. 7 Sub Gets Bigger in Greenpoint
